text: There was a bid to burgle Indian Overseas Bank branch at Narthamlalai on the Tiruchi - Pudukottai highway on Sunday night. Some persons had disconnected the circuit of surveillance camera at the entrance to the branch and attempted to cut off the iron bars of a window at the rear side of the branch. A blade used for breaking the iron grill of the window was found. Branch manager Gunasekaran, who saw the disconnected circuit of the camera, alerted the police. A team visited the spot. A case has been registered but no arrest has been made.
title: Bid to burgle bank
